key_risks: Retail sector volatility due to e-commerce growth and economic downturns
Economic sensitivity to recessions, inflation, and rising interest rates
Tenant concentration risk from defaults or lease expirations
Regulatory and environmental risks from zoning laws and litigation
Lingering COVID-19 impacts on retail demand and tenant financial health
controversies: Exposure to retail bankruptcies and store closures
Potential challenges from environmental regulations and property-related litigation
environmental_issues: Compliance with environmental regulations and sustainability practices
social_issues: Impact of retail sector volatility on tenant and community stability
governance_issues: None explicitly mentioned, but general governance practices are emphasized
